name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Image ALT Search for Kagura Manga

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search images on https://readkaguramanga.com/ based on their ALT tags.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Image ALT Search for Kagura Manga" is a powerful Chrome extension specifically designed for users of https://readkaguramanga.com/. This tool enhances your browsing experience by allowing you to search for images on the site based on their ALT text descriptions.

Whether you're debating the best characters , or looking for your favourite panels for art purposes or sharing purposes this extension will help.
